channel.title: Java Question
channel.description:
[b]Hello everyone[/b], I've got a problem with my Java and hope you guys have some answers.
[b]Question,[/b] Once i'm trying to Compile i get the second message; [code]Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any button to continue...[/code]
I have absolutely no idea what it means or how to fix it. My current Java version is 6, ive tried the same with 7 but i get the same message including 2 errors.
Greetings, Zand

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @Zandstorm2 Zandstorm2
item.description:
@Zandstorm2 wrote:

Sinned:

JDK is your compiler, JRE is your runtime environment. So you need to use jdk1.6.0_## because your jre6 folder has no javac, as you guessed.

Thanks, that was pretty usefull. Lets see if i can fix this now. ;p

Read full topic

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

JDK is your compiler, JRE is your runtime environment. So you need to use jdk1.6.0_## because your jre6 folder has no javac, as you guessed.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Why not get the newest JDK? I believe you can download it from Oracle

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @Zandstorm2 Zandstorm2
item.description:
@Zandstorm2 wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:9, topic:442732”][quote author=Zandstorm2 link=topic=545415.msg3997992#msg3997992 date=1337544486]
Sorry TiVo, but both codes arent working. I guess because Jre6 and Jre7 don’t have a ‘Javac.exe’ file.
[/quote]
why don’t you just remove the -d.[/quote]
I can remove as much as i want but that won’t help anything at all, it shows up more errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

First, change the C:/Program Files/jre to your JDK Directory. I recommend using JDK6.

Then use this compiler:

@echo off title Quantum Compiler "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/your jdk directory/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java src\org\dementhium\event\impl\interfaces\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\combat\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\player\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\fishing\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\cutscenes\impl\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\npc\impl\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\combat\impl\npc\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\misc\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\minigames\*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/spells/modern/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/spells/ancient/*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\magic\*.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ObjectPacketHandler.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\Prayer.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnItemHandler.java src/org/dementhium/content/cutscenes/*.java src/org/dementhium/net/packethandlers/NpcOption.java src/org/dementhium/model/map/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/specs/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/Skills.java src/org/dementhium/content/Commands.java src/org/dementhium/event/impl/interfaces/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/Skills.java src/org/dementhium/content/DialogueManager.java src/org/dementhium/net/packethandlers/ActionButtonHandler.java src/org/dementhium/content/misc/*.java src/org/dementhium/content/misc/MagicStaff.java src/org/dementhium/event/impl/interfaces/EnchantedGemListener.java pause

Or this:

@echo off title Quantum Compiler "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/your jdk directory/bin/javac.exe" -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java src\org\dementhium\event\impl\interfaces\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\combat\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\player\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\fishing\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\cutscenes\impl\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\npc\impl\*.java src\org\dementhium\model\combat\impl\npc\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\misc\*.java src\org\dementhium\content\minigames\*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/spells/modern/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/spells/ancient/*.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\magic\*.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ObjectPacketHandler.java src\org\dementhium\content\skills\Prayer.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnItemHandler.java src/org/dementhium/content/cutscenes/*.java src/org/dementhium/net/packethandlers/NpcOption.java src/org/dementhium/model/map/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/combat/impl/specs/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/Skills.java src/org/dementhium/content/Commands.java src/org/dementhium/event/impl/interfaces/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/*.java src/org/dementhium/model/player/Skills.java src/org/dementhium/content/DialogueManager.java src/org/dementhium/net/packethandlers/ActionButtonHandler.java src/org/dementhium/content/misc/*.java src/org/dementhium/content/misc/MagicStaff.java src/org/dementhium/event/impl/interfaces/EnchantedGemListener.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

I don’t know if it makes any difference but try changing jre6 to jdk1.6.0_## (## = your version). I’d recommend sticking with Java 6 and uninstalling 7 because it saves hassle in the long run if you’re downloading and using servers made in Java 6.

Read full topic

Hello everyone,
I’ve got a problem with my Java and hope you guys have some answers.

Once i’m trying to Compile i get the second message;

Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any button to continue...
